sentences.en: A system of forced labour was used on the cocoa plantations.
sentences.cn: 可可种植园中曾实行强迫劳役制。

sentences.en: About 70% of the cocoa acreage is treated with insecticide.
sentences.cn: 大约70%的可可树林地喷过杀虫剂。
加纳的主要出口商品是可可豆。

sentences.en: Most foreign trading companies in West Africa deals in rubber, cocoa and vegetable oil.
sentences.cn: 西非的大多数外贸公司经营橡胶 、 可可和植物油.

sentences.en: Steam rose from her mug of cocoa.
sentences.cn: 水汽从她那杯可可饮料里升起.

sentences.en: Suppose a person bought a standard contract for 30,000 kilograms of cocoa.
sentences.cn: 假设某人买进一份30000公斤可可的标准合同.

sentences.en: Take a cup of cocoa and then go to bed.
The cocoa industry dwindled because it became increasingly difficult to cover costs.
sentences.cn: 由于越来越难以收回成本，可可产业日渐衰落。

sentences.en: The Holmbergs were sitting before a roaring fire in the lounge, sipping their cocoa.
sentences.cn: 霍姆伯格一家坐在客厅里，对着熊熊炉火呷着可可。

sentences.en: The Ivory Coast became the world's leading cocoa producer.
sentences.cn: 象牙海岸成为世界上可可粉的主要产地。

sentences.en: The wild cocoa tree is effectively immortal.
sentences.cn: 野生可可树实际上是不会死的.

sentences.en: They always had a cup of cocoa last thing at night.
sentences.cn: 他们总是在临睡前喝杯可可饮料.

sentences.en: They are con-trolling so much cocoa that they are virtually monopolizing the market.
sentences.cn: 他们控制了大量的可可粉，因此他们几乎垄断了整个市场。

sentences.en: West Africa was the pivot of the cocoa trade.
sentences.cn: 西非是可可豆贸易的中心。

words.tran_cn: [作物]可可粉；可可豆；可可饮料；深褐色

trans.tran_cn: 可可，可可粉，可可饮料，深褐色
trans.tran_en: a brown powder made from cocoa beans, used to make chocolate and to give a chocolate taste to foods
